title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (https://www.contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available https://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/.

what: Access the City of Toronto Open Data Portal
title: Access the City of Toronto Open Data Portal
text: opendatatoronto R interface City Toronto Open Data Portal. goal package help read data directly R without needing manually download via portal. information, please visit package website vignettes: Introduction opendatatoronto Retrieving multi-sheet XLS/XLSX resources Retrieving multi-file ZIP resources Working spatial data portal

title: Access the City of Toronto Open Data Portal
text: can intall released version opendatatoronto CRAN: development version GitHub :

title: Access the City of Toronto Open Data Portal
text: Portal, datasets called packages. can see list available packages using list_packages(). show metadata package, including topics (.e. tags) package covers, civic issues addresses, description , many resources (formats), often refreshed last refreshed. can also search packages title: see metadata specific package: Within package, number resources - e.g. CSV, XSLX, JSON, SHP files, . Resources actual “data”. given package, can get list resources using list_package_resources(). can pass package id (contained marriage_license_packages ): can also get list resources using package’s URL Portal: Finally (usefully!), can download resource (.e., actual data) directly R using get_resource():
code: library(opendatatoronto) packages <- list_packages(limit = 10) packages #> # A tibble: 10 × 11 #>    title            id    topics civic_issues publisher excerpt dataset_category #>    <chr>            <chr> <chr>  <chr>        <chr>     <chr>   <chr>            #>  1 Licensed Dogs a… lice… "Comm… NULL         Municipa… "The r… Table            #>  2 Multi-Tenant (R… mult… "Perm… NULL         Municipa… "This … Table            #>  3 Polls conducted… 7bce… "City… NULL         City Cle… "Polls… Table            #>  4 Rain Gauge Loca… f293… "c(\"… NULL         Toronto … "This … Document         #>  5 Sidewalk Constr… side… "Tran… NULL         Transpor… "The C… Map              #>  6 Traffic Signal … 7dda… "Tran… Mobility     Transpor… "This … Document         #>  7 Daily Shelter &… 21c8… "c(\"… NULL         Toronto … "Daily… Table            #>  8 Traffic Volumes… traf… "Tran… Mobility     Transpor… "This … Table            #>  9 Toronto Island … toro… "Tran… NULL         Parks, F… "This … Table            #> 10 Toronto Open Da… open… "City… NULL         Informat… "This … Table            #> # ℹ 4 more variables: num_resources <int>, formats <chr>, refresh_rate <chr>, #> #   last_refreshed <date> ttc_packages <- search_packages("ttc")  ttc_packages #> # A tibble: 15 × 11 #>    title            id    topics civic_issues publisher excerpt dataset_category #>    <chr>            <chr> <chr>  <chr>        <chr>     <chr>   <chr>            #>  1 TTC Subway Shap… c01c… "NULL" "NULL"       Toronto … "This … Document         #>  2 TTC Ridership A… ef35… "Tran… "Mobility"   Toronto … "This … Document         #>  3 TTC Routes and … 7795… "Tran… "NULL"       Toronto … "Data … Document         #>  4 TTC Subway Dela… 996c… "Tran… "NULL"       Toronto … "TTC S… Document         #>  5 TTC Bus Delay D… e271… "Tran… "NULL"       Toronto … "TTC B… Document         #>  6 TTC Streetcar D… b68c… "Tran… "NULL"       Toronto … "TTC S… Document         #>  7 TTC BusTime Rea… 31ed… "Tran… "Mobility"   Toronto … "This … Document         #>  8 TTC Real-Time N… 8217… "Tran… "NULL"       Toronto … "The N… Document         #>  9 TTC  - Ridershi… 2c4c… "c(\"… "c(\"Fiscal… Toronto … "This … Website          #> 10 TTC - Monthly R… d2a7… "Tran… "NULL"       Toronto … "This … Website          #> 11 TTC - Average W… 4b80… "Tran… "NULL"       Toronto … "This … Website          #> 12 TTC Annual Pass… 1444… "Tran… "Mobility"   Toronto … "This … Website          #> 13 TTC - Annual Pa… aedd… "Tran… "Mobility"   Toronto … "This … Website          #> 14 TTC Ridership -… 4eb6… "Tran… "NULL"       Toronto … "This … Document         #> 15 TTC Ridership -… d9dc… "Tran… "Mobility"   Toronto … "This … Document         #> # ℹ 4 more variables: num_resources <int>, formats <chr>, refresh_rate <chr>, #> #   last_refreshed <date> show_package("996cfe8d-fb35-40ce-b569-698d51fc683b") #> # A tibble: 4 × 11 #>   title             id    topics civic_issues publisher excerpt dataset_category #>   <chr>             <chr> <chr>  <chr>        <chr>     <chr>   <chr>            #> 1 TTC Subway Delay… 996c… Trans… <NA>         Toronto … TTC Su… Document         #> 2 TTC Subway Delay… 996c… Trans… <NA>         Toronto … TTC Su… Document         #> 3 TTC Subway Delay… 996c… Trans… <NA>         Toronto … TTC Su… Document         #> 4 TTC Subway Delay… 996c… Trans… <NA>         Toronto … TTC Su… Document         #> # ℹ 4 more variables: num_resources <int>, formats <chr>, refresh_rate <chr>, #> #   last_refreshed <date> marriage_licence_packages <- search_packages("Marriage Licence Statistics")  marriage_licence_resources <- marriage_licence_packages %>%   list_package_resources()  marriage_licence_resources #> # A tibble: 4 × 4 #>   name                                  id                  format last_modified #>   <chr>                                 <chr>               <chr>  <date>        #> 1 Marriage Licence Statistics Data      4d985c1d-9c7e-4f74… CSV    2025-04-01    #> 2 Marriage Licence Statistics Data.csv  01dff98a-b56b-4237… CSV    2025-04-01    #> 3 Marriage Licence Statistics Data.xml  41148040-e29d-4a02… XML    2025-04-01    #> 4 Marriage Licence Statistics Data.json 620da420-89be-4227… JSON   2025-04-01 list_package_resources("https://open.toronto.ca/dataset/sexual-health-clinic-locations-hours-and-services/") #> # A tibble: 2 × 4 #>   name                                                id    format last_modified #>   <chr>                                               <chr> <chr>  <date>        #> 1 sexual-health-clinic-locations-hours-and-services-… 7076… XLSX   2019-08-15    #> 2 Sexual-health-clinic-locations-hours-and-services-… 5af8… XLSX   2019-08-15 marriage_licence_statistics <- marriage_licence_resources %>%   head(1) %>%   get_resource()  marriage_licence_statistics #> # A tibble: 558 × 4 #>    `_id` CIVIC_CENTRE MARRIAGE_LICENSES TIME_PERIOD #>    <int> <chr>                    <int> <chr>       #>  1 19231 ET                          80 2011-01     #>  2 19232 NY                         136 2011-01     #>  3 19233 SC                         159 2011-01     #>  4 19234 TO                         367 2011-01     #>  5 19235 ET                         109 2011-02     #>  6 19236 NY                         150 2011-02     #>  7 19237 SC                         154 2011-02     #>  8 19238 TO                         383 2011-02     #>  9 19239 ET                         177 2011-03     #> 10 19240 NY                         231 2011-03     #> # ℹ 548 more rows

what: Download a resource into your R session — get_resource
title: Download a resource into your R session — get_resource
text: Download resource portal directly R session. CSV, XLS, XLSX, XML, JSON, SHP, ZIP, GeoJSON resources supported.

title: Download a resource into your R session — get_resource
Download a resource into your R session — get_resource
text: resource way identify resource. Either resource ID (passed character vector directly) single resource resulting list_package_resources.

title: Download a resource into your R session — get_resource
text: cases, resource returned tibble list tibbles. spatial resource (.e. SHP GeoJSON), returned sf object.

title: Download a resource into your R session — get_resource
code: # \donttest{ list_package_resources("https://open.toronto.ca/dataset/neighbourhoods/") %>% head(1) %>% get_resource() #> Simple feature collection with 158 features and 11 fields #> Geometry type: POLYGON #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: -79.63926 ymin: 43.581 xmax: -79.11527 ymax: 43.85546 #> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84 #> # A tibble: 158 × 12 #>    `_id` AREA_ID AREA_ATTR_ID PARENT_AREA_ID AREA_SHORT_CODE AREA_LONG_CODE #>    <int>   <int>        <int> <lgl>          <chr>           <chr>          #>  1     1 2502366     26022881 NA             174             174            #>  2     2 2502365     26022880 NA             173             173            #>  3     3 2502364     26022879 NA             172             172            #>  4     4 2502363     26022878 NA             171             171            #>  5     5 2502362     26022877 NA             170             170            #>  6     6 2502361     26022876 NA             169             169            #>  7     7 2502360     26022875 NA             156             156            #>  8     8 2502359     26022874 NA             155             155            #>  9     9 2502358     26022873 NA             154             154            #> 10    10 2502357     26022872 NA             153             153            #> # ℹ 148 more rows #> # ℹ 6 more variables: AREA_NAME <chr>, AREA_DESC <chr>, CLASSIFICATION <chr>, #> #   CLASSIFICATION_CODE <chr>, OBJECTID <int>, geometry <POLYGON [°]> # }

text: List resources package portal.

title: List resources for a package — list_package_resources
List resources for a package — list_package_resources
text: package way identify package. Either package ID (passed character vector directly), single package resulting list_packages search_packages, package's URL portal.

title: List resources for a package — list_package_resources
text: tibble resources along metadata, including name, id, format (format resource file), last_modified (date resource last modified).

4326.gpkg    067a6003-f5d6-41d2-… gpkg   2025-03-27    #>  3 Transit shelter data - 2945.gpkg    b8f29291-0027-494c-… GPKG   2022-04-22    #>  4 Transit shelter data - 4326.csv     ecf41899-aed0-405e-… CSV    2025-03-27    #>  5 Transit shelter data - 2945.csv     5a1bc1c9-7784-4392-… CSV    2022-04-22    #>  6 Transit shelter data - 4326.geojson e4bdd549-dc39-4a3e-… GeoJS… 2025-03-27    #>  7 Transit shelter data - 2945.geojson ccbb8cbc-811a-4276-… GeoJS… 2022-04-22    #>  8 Transit shelter data - 4326.zip     2d0b0f40-b86a-42b2-… SHP    2025-03-27    #>  9 Transit shelter data - 2945.zip     f6778e95-0cf4-494d-… SHP    2022-04-22    #> 10 Transit shelter data - 2952.gpkg    15261fdf-8cc1-4065-… gpkg   2025-03-27    #> 11 Transit shelter data - 2952.geojson fa0d875c-53c2-4715-… GeoJS… 2025-01-01    #> 12 Transit shelter data - 2952.csv     fbdf81d6-8f40-4781-… CSV    2025-03-27    #> 13 Transit shelter data - 2952.zip     757fb910-dbf7-4148-… SHP    2025-03-27    list_package_resources("https://open.toronto.ca/dataset/ttc-subway-delay-data") #> # A tibble: 15 × 4 #>    name                                  id                 format last_modified #>    <chr>                                 <chr>              <chr>  <date>        #>  1 ttc-subway-delay-codes                3900e649-f31e-4b7… XLSX   2022-04-06    #>  2 ttc-subway-delay-data-readme          ca43ac3d-3940-431… XLSX   2022-04-06    #>  3 ttc-subway-delay-jan-2014-april-2017  8ca4a6ed-5e7e-4b9… XLSX   2022-04-06    #>  4 ttc-subway-delay-may-december-2017    e2ee9f63-3130-4d6… XLSX   2022-04-06    #>  5 ttc-subway-delay-data-2018            32bd0973-e83d-4df… XLSX   2022-04-06    #>  6 ttc-subway-delay-data-2019            1df6aace-fa16-40e… XLSX   2022-04-06    #>  7 ttc-subway-delay-data-2020            1ba66ead-cddf-453… XLSX   2022-04-06    #>  8 ttc-subway-delay-data-2021            c6e4f5eb-6ed7-4db… XLSX   2022-04-06    #>  9 ttc-subway-delay-data-2022            441143ca-8194-44c… XLSX   2023-01-23    #> 10 ttc-subway-delay-data-2023            2fbec48b-33d9-489… XLSX   2024-01-18    #> 11 ttc-subway-delay-data-2024            2ee1a65c-da06-4ad… XLSX   2025-01-21    #> 12 TTC Subway Delay Data since 2025      6088e14f-e46e-4f5… XLSX   NA            #> 13 TTC Subway Delay Data since 2025.csv  0b6e5c52-e993-46d… CSV    2025-03-11    #> 14 TTC Subway Delay Data since 2025.xml  021e6a9d-d31e-436… XML    2025-03-11    #> 15 TTC Subway Delay Data since 2025.json fed58a09-14bc-403… JSON   2025-03-11    # }

title: List packages — list_packages
text: List packages available portal.

title: List packages — list_packages
text: limit maximum number packages return. default 50.

title: List packages — list_packages
text: tibble available packages metadata, including title, id, topics, civic_issues, excerpt, publisher, dataset_category, num_resources (number resources package), formats (different formats resources), refresh_rate (often package refreshed), last_refreshed (date last refreshed).

title: List packages — list_packages
code: # \donttest{ list_packages(5) #> # A tibble: 5 × 11 #>   title             id    topics civic_issues publisher excerpt dataset_category #>   <chr>             <chr> <chr>  <chr>        <chr>     <chr>   <chr>            #> 1 Toronto Island F… toro… "Tran… NA           Parks, F… "This … Table            #> 2 Licensed Dogs an… lice… "Comm… NA           Municipa… "The r… Table            #> 3 Multi-Tenant (Ro… mult… "Perm… NA           Municipa… "This … Table            #> 4 Polls conducted … 7bce… "City… NA           City Cle… "Polls… Table            #> 5 Rain Gauge Locat… f293… "c(\"… NA           Toronto … "This … Document         #> # ℹ 4 more variables: num_resources <int>, formats <chr>, refresh_rate <chr>, #> #   last_refreshed <date> # }

title: opendatatoronto — opendatatoronto-package
text: opendatatoronto R interface City Toronto's Open Data Portal. goal package help read data directly R without needing manually download via portal.

title: opendatatoronto — opendatatoronto-package
text: information, please start vignettes: browseVignettes(package = "opendatatoronto") visit package website.

title: opendatatoronto — opendatatoronto-package
text: Maintainer: Sharla Gelfand sharla.gelfand@gmail.com contributors: City Toronto [copyright holder, funder]

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: See magrittr::%>% details.

title: Search packages by title — search_packages
text: Search portal packages title.

title: Search packages by title — search_packages
text: title Title search (case-insensitive). limit Maximum number packages return. default 50. maximum limit 1000.

title: Search packages by title — search_packages
text: tibble matching packages along package metadata, including title, id, topics, civic_issues, excerpt, publisher, dataset_category, num_resources (number resources package), formats (different formats resources), refresh_rate (often package refreshed), last_refreshed (date last refreshed).
